name: Falling Sand Engine
description:
A falling sand game I wrote as a fun side project. The performance could be better, but this game is still in development and it's just a fun little side project at the moment.

You can place 7 different element at your mouse position. All with unique properties and interactions.

Controls:

E = Toggle all element buttons
F3 = Toggle debug menu
WASD = Camera movement
Scroll wheel = Camera lens size
LMB = Placing cells
RMB = Destroying Cells
TAB = Reset world
Num 1 to 7 = Quickly select elements
